item.title: Education Department employees offered $25,000 buyout
item.description: The Department of Education is looking to downsize by offering employees a $25,000 buyout.

item.title: Crypto stocks rise after Trump names currencies in strategic reserve
item.description: Crypto stocks spiked Monday after President Trump named the cryptocurrencies to be held in a U.S. strategic reserve.

item.title: Trump vows to 'tell it like it is' in his joint address to Congress
item.description: President Trump pledged Monday to lay it all out for the American people when he delivers his joint address to Congress on Tuesday.
